MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL46 postcode area of Llanfair, affecting properties in Pant Yr Onnen and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at Midnight due to a faulty piece of equipment on the overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 1:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:37PM on 23rd April 2021.
